item.description:
Give people more opportunities to know what's going on in Boston. Enjoy Boston!

This event will be hold from 4pm to 10pm. Free admission to all venues with college ID

this news is on newspaper Metro page 26.

Exhibit Halls
More than 700 interactive exhibits, plus Theater of Electricity demos and live animal presentations.
Planetarium
Journey to the Edge of Space and Time, Laser Radiohead, Laser Guitar Hero, and more
Mugar Omni Theater
Deep Sea, Mystic India, Adrenaline Rush: The Science of Risk, and more
3-D Digital Cinema
Planet You, The world of Sharks, Fly Me to the Moon:3-D Space Show, Attraction and Bugs!
Free Raffle
Prizes available from many Boston-area stores, restaurants, and venues
Boston Duck Tours
Tours depart from the Museum at 4:00PM AND 4:30PM


Limit of two show tickets per person. Parking is Free, or take the MBTA Green Line to Science Park.

Information/directions: 617-723-2500. 617-589-0417
item.how_to_find_us: i'm not sure if i will be there, people who ESVP YES could email each other set the time to meet. Have fun!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: College Night (Museum of Science ) Free admission to all venues with college ID
